title: Executive Order 5549-Amendment to the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers Respecting Citizenship
content: Chapter X of the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States, entitled "Citizenship" is hereby canceled and the following substituted therefor:
X-l. Laws and procedure respecting citizenship
Embassies, legations, and other missions are hereby authorized to follow the instructions pertaining to citizenship set forth in Article X of the Consular Regulations.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5549-Amendment to the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers Respecting Citizenship Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361183
